item.title: Um simple question
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“shiniy, post:2, topic:152058”]here is mys
[br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2007, 11:28:59 PM[/size][hr]//this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Thug Life”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Thug life is online!”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Thug life is offline!”;
}
}
}[/quote]

Thats an NPC Mate, He means when he logs in Everyone Noes he has logged in.

Also, Try adding { At the beginning of the code And this at the end }

Example:

{
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pure 4 u 2 c"))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "OMFG 0wner pure HAS LOGGED ON!!!";
}

If this doesn’t work, Sorry.

Read full topic

well i get this error =\

client.java:11975: illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
^

Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

That error normally means the code is in the wrong place or you’re missing a { or a }
